validityText:

1. "To confirm your registration, please click the link sent to your email."
2. "If you did not receive the email, check your spam folder."
3. "Contact support if you need further assistance."

Each identified sentence is complete, distinct, and ends with appropriate punctuation. Thus, the input contains the required minimum of three sentences to be compliant with the specification.

No violation.
